Core Services

Our flagship photography services designed to meet all your product marketing needs.

Creative Product Photography
Starting from PKR 15,000

Stunning, on-brand visuals designed to elevate your brand and capture attention across platforms with artistic style and purpose.

What's Included:

  • Custom lighting setups
  • Brand-aligned styling
  • Multiple angle shots
  • High-resolution delivery
E-Commerce Photography
Starting from PKR 8,000

High-quality product shots with clean backgrounds tailored for platforms like Amazon, Daraz, and Shopify — clear, compliant, and consistent.

What's Included:

  • White background shots
  • Platform compliance
  • Bulk product handling
  • Quick turnaround
Flat Lay & Styled Shoots
Starting from PKR 12,000

From clean flat lays to styled storytelling, we create scenes that reflect your brand's personality — ideal for lookbooks, Instagram, and beyond.

What's Included:

  • Creative compositions
  • Brand storytelling
  • Social media ready
  • Props included
Lifestyle Photography
Starting from PKR 25,000

Creative and engaging lifestyle shots of your products in real-world settings that connect with your target audience.

What's Included:

  • Model integration
  • Real-world settings
  • Emotional connection
  • Brand narrative

Enhance your photography package with these professional add-ons and specialized services.

360° Product View

Interactive 360-degree product photography for enhanced customer experience.

PKR 5,000 per product

Photo Retouching

Professional photo retouching and color correction for perfect product images.

PKR 500 per image

Background Removal

Clean cutouts and transparency for versatile image usage.

PKR 300 per image

Product Videos

Dynamic videos and stop-motion effects to showcase your products.

Starting from PKR 20,000

Rush Delivery

Same day or next day turnaround for urgent projects.

50% additional charge

Bulk Photography

Special rates for large product catalogs and inventory shoots.

Custom pricing available

Our Process

From initial consultation to final delivery, here's how we bring your vision to life.

01

Consultation

We discuss your needs, brand, and vision to create the perfect photography plan.

02

Planning

Detailed shoot planning including styling, props, and creative direction.

03

Photography

Professional shoot with attention to every detail and multiple variations.

04

Delivery

Edited, high-resolution images delivered in your preferred format and timeline.
